**Janitorial Services for Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada’s Shirleys Bay Campus**

**Solicitation Number:** 208281
**Quote Closing Date:** October 23, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time

**Description:**
Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada’s Communications Research Centre is seeking contractors to provide comprehensive janitorial services for the Shirleys Bay Campus. The scope of works involves cleaning and maintaining a total cleanable area of approximately 13,320 square meters. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary labour, supplies, and equipment.

**Criteria for Awarding:**
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the bidders.

**Pre-Qualification Requirements:**
A mandatory site visit will be held on September 26, 2023 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time at the Communications Research Centre located at 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, ON, to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend. Bidders will also be required to sign an attendance sheet and provide photo identification for access onto campus grounds.

**Timeline:**
* Mandatory site visit on September 26, 2023
* Quote submission on October 23, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time

**Points of Contact:**

* Kelly Stauffer, Procurement Authority
* Email: [kelly.stauffer@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:kelly.stauffer@ised-isde.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 990-8812

Please refer to the attached documents for further details regarding the solicitation and requirements.
